description: Add Xray tests selected by a JQL query to a Test Repository folder. Returns the affected folder details and which tests were added or skipped.

jql.description: JQL query used to select the tests to add (e.g., project = PROJ AND issuetype = Test).

path.description: Target Test Repository folder path (e.g., Regression/Ui/Login). If omitted or empty, the root folder is used.

project.description: The Jira project key (for example, PROJ).

name: add_xray_tests_to_folder

added.description: Test keys successfully added to the folder.

link.description: Direct URL to the folder in Jira/Xray (if available).

path.description: Repository path where tests were added.

skipped.description: Test keys not added (already in folder or not eligible).
